extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQ: CHEM 313 OR ENCH 346 OR CHEM 346 and registered in BSCE

basic.description: The application of quantum mechanics to the structures and internal motions of molecules. The foundations of electronic, vibrational, rotational and NMR spectroscopy will be discussed together with their applications. Winter Term.
basic.subject: ENCH
basic.title: Chem Bond: Comp & Spectro.
